      • getWeight

        @ManagedAttribute
@Description(value="Weight used in read request balancing")
public int getWeight()
        Returns the relative "weight" of this cluster node. In general, when choosing a node to service read requests, a cluster will favor the node with the highest weight. A weight of 0 is somewhat special, depending on the type of balancer used by the cluster. In most cases, a weight of 0 means that this node will never service read requests unless it is the only node in the cluster.
        Specified by:
        getWeight in interface Database<Z>
        Returns:
        a positive integer
        See Also:
        Database.getWeight()

public void setWeight(int weight)
